      • getField

        public static Field getField(int n)
        Returns:
        an IntField with value n

      • createTupleList

        public static TupleIterator createTupleList(int width,
                                            int[] tupdata)
        Parameters:
        width - the number of fields in each tuple
        tupdata - an array such that the ith element the jth tuple lives in slot j * width + i
        Returns:
        a DbIterator over a list of tuples constructed over the data provided in the constructor. This iterator is already open.
        Throws:
        DbException - if we encounter an error creating the TupleIterator

      • createTupleList

        public static TupleIterator createTupleList(int width,
                                            java.lang.Object[] tupdata)
        Parameters:
        width - the number of fields in each tuple
        tupdata - an array such that the ith element the jth tuple lives in slot j * width + i. Objects can be strings or ints; tuples must all be of same type.
        Returns:
        a DbIterator over a list of tuples constructed over the data provided in the constructor. This iterator is already open.
        Throws:
        DbException - if we encounter an error creating the TupleIterator

      • compareTuples

        public static boolean compareTuples(Tuple t1,
                                    Tuple t2)
        Returns:
        true iff the tuples have the same number of fields and corresponding fields in the two Tuples are all equal.

      • compareDbIterators

        public static void compareDbIterators(DbIterator expected,
                                      DbIterator actual)
                               throws DbException,
                                      TransactionAbortedException
        Check to see if the DbIterators have the same number of tuples and each tuple pair in parallel iteration satisfies compareTuples . If not, throw an assertion.
        Throws:
        DbException
        TransactionAbortedException

      • matchAllTuples

        public static void matchAllTuples(DbIterator expected,
                                  DbIterator actual)
                           throws DbException,
                                  TransactionAbortedException
        Check to see if every tuple in expected matches some tuple in actual via compareTuples. Note that actual may be a superset. If not, throw an assertion.
        Throws:
        DbException
        TransactionAbortedException

      • checkExhausted

        public static boolean checkExhausted(DbIterator it)

        Verifies that the DbIterator has been exhausted of all elements.
        Throws:
        TransactionAbortedException
